body_html:
@zheng-xq sorry, which logs do you need?

The links for nvidia-modprobe:
https://deeptalk.lambdal.com/t/failed-call-to-cuinit-cuda-error-unknown/57
http://kawahara.ca/tensorflow-failed-call-to-cuinit-cuda_error_unknown/

The link for os.environ:
#16860
But thats not relevant for my issue because i dont specify the gpu, because only 1 is installed at 0

body:
@zheng-xq sorry, which logs do you need?

The links for `nvidia-modprobe`:
https://deeptalk.lambdal.com/t/failed-call-to-cuinit-cuda-error-unknown/57
http://kawahara.ca/tensorflow-failed-call-to-cuinit-cuda_error_unknown/

The link for `os.environ`:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16860
But thats not relevant for my issue because i dont specify the gpu, because only 1 is installed at 0
